alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 14 at 9:07PM CDT until August 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 34.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Monday was 34.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
